attributes.action: be realistic and realise that everyone needs their own money and shouldn't have to rely on their partner to look after them if they can't work or are temporarily unemployed and their partner is working.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been on incapacity benefit for some time as I have been unable to work and due to the government have had to rely on my partner to pay for my existence and now that I feel I am able to work again I have been told the same will happen on Jobseekers Allowance. It's unfair and outdated.
